thread.title: Watch: Cross Gene Drops “Comeback Spoiler” Video For Return With “Mirror”
thread.title_full: Watch: Cross Gene Drops “Comeback Spoiler” Video For Return With “Mirror”

author: ilmare42
title: Watch: Cross Gene Drops “Comeback Spoiler” Video For Return With “Mirror”
text:
Cross Gene has given fans another sneak peek at their comeback! 
On February 5 at midnight KST, the group shared a “comeback spoiler” video for their upcoming return. As a follow-up to their previously released quick teaser clips , this video gives us plenty of new glimpses at their music video, featuring an interesting back-and-forth switch between dark and light concepts! 
Cross Gene’s new mini album “Mirror” will feature the title track “Black or White,” and is due out on February 8. They have already shared two pre-release tracks from the album, entitled “White Mind” and “Black Mind,” via digital music sites. 
Are you looking forward to this comeback by Cross Gene?
